item.title: How do i change were the npc are
item.dc:creator: @Mercifies Mercifies
item.description:
@Mercifies wrote:

Look for a file called autospawn.cfg. Then it will have a list looking something like this (Note: I only post the first 2 npcâ€™s.)

//------NpcID---CoordX--CoordY--Height--RangeX1-RangeY1-RangeX2-RangeY2-WalkType-Descrption spawn = 2821 3093 3506 0 0 0 0 0 1 Zeke spawn = 1596 3306 9379 0 0 0 0 0 1 PK rewards
They may be different for you but this is a general tutorial. You can change where Zeke is standing by changing CoordX and CoordY. You can find these by logging out and going into character files and finding the coordinates. Another ways is some games have it displayed in the settings icon.

But, maybe you want to create a new train. There are 2 ways to find out an npc.

  1. In-game you will see the npc and if you right click it should give you the NpcID.

  2. You can open up npc.cfg and search the name of the npc. You can also change the hp of the npc but more importantly, find the NpcID.

I hope this has helped

Read full topic
item.source: How do i change were the npc are
